description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Pictorial Book of Anecdotes and Incidents of the War of the Rebellion, civil, military, naval and domestic; embracing the ... events of the great conflict in the United States ... from ... 1830 to the Assassination of President Lincoln, and the end of the War ... Illustrated, etc" Author: KIRKLAND, Frazar - pseud. [i.e. Richard Miller Devens.] Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9603.ee.10." Page: 375 Place of Publishing: Hartford, Connecticut Date of Publishing: 1866 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001975901 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life.
